QuestData.Title: Rise, Godfrey
QuestData.Description: You are unwavering in your loyalty to the Forsaken, $n. Know that what you have done for us - for the Horde - will not go unnoticed. With Lord Godfrey and his men recovered, we will have a great advantage over the Gilneas Liberation Front and the rest of the Alliance dogs.$B$BNow stand by my side as Lord Godfrey is reborn as one of us. Together we will bring him and his men into the fold.
QuestData.LogDescription: Stand by Lady Sylvanas Windrunner as she initiates Lord Godfrey and his men.
QuestData.CompletionText: Today marks a new beginning for the Forsaken and the end of the Alliance in Lordaeron!
QuestData.RewardText: Today marks a new beginning for the Forsaken and the end of the Alliance in Lordaeron!
